name: Setup CLI pager configuration
description: AWS CLIとGitのpagerを無効化する設定を~/.zshrcに追加します

action.command:
echo '
# Disable CLI pagers (for Kiro agent)
export AWS_PAGER=""
export GIT_PAGER=""' >> ~/.zshrc && echo '✅ Pager configuration added to ~/.zshrc' && echo 'Run: source ~/.zshrc to apply changes'
